item.title: World Bank raises China's GDP forecast for 2024, 2025
item.description: The World Bank raised its 2024-2025 growth forecasts for China but warned of challenges from weak confidence and property sector headwinds.

item.title: Japan stocks rise as government reportedly set to propose record budget
item.description: Asia-Pacific stocks rose Thursday, with several markets closed for Boxing Day.

item.title: Asia’s year in review: Who had it good — and who had it bad — in 2024
item.description: As the region awaits the return of Donald Trump to the White House and to a possible tumultuous Year of the Snake in the lunar calendar, we take a loo...

item.title: Japan's budget to hit record, but with reduced new bond issuance, Reuters reports
item.description: Japan plans a record $735 billion budget for the fiscal year starting April, driven by rising social security and debt-servicing costs, Reuters report...

item.title: Nvidia sees 'remarkable' influx of retail investor dollars as traders flock to AI darling
item.description: Everyday traders bought nearly $30 billion of Nvidia shares on net this year, Vanda data shows.
